review:
A superb human, selfless, caring and patient. He always looks for ways to reduce medication. 
One always comes out feeling good and relaxed after meeting him. 
His diagnostic abilities are excellent and always to the point. A Doctor to be trusted and respected.

I am overwhelmed by the overtly pleasant experience at your clinic. My Elder kid got habituated to using potty in no time thanks to your councelling. I am awestruck by the way you made my motherly life effortless. Your  infallible diagnosis and the effectual medication is truly appealing. Your warm reception of patients that is seldom seen among doctors of the day adds a great medicinal value to your therapeutics. You benchmarked yourself as a clinic that earned patients trust incredibly in your formative days itself and i believe that precious trust will take you and your clinic a long way en route to medical excellence .I highly recommend this clinic ...Long way to go.... kudos to the team of kindle clinics

My son was a premature baby at 1.30 kg . Unlike all other doctors Dr Sudheer asked me to not admit him in hospital instead give him very traditional therapy called kangaroo mother therapy. He told me that the risk of infection could be low at home and the baby will grow very quickly when he is with the mother; I did not expect this kind of result and my baby was 2.25 kg within 10 days and touchwood he is a very healthy and happy baby with no delayed milestones since . It is very rare to find this kind of honesty and experience in the doctors today and I am very lucky to have found such a good doctor for my son . I will highly recommend going to Dr Sudhir ** **  **** *************  *** ** very ethical .

I appreciate dr Sudheer kumar his patience and knowledge. Dr listened us with patience and explained things thoroughly. Other than treatment dr explained many lifestyle stuff about kids growing.
Sincere thanks.
**** **** ******* Listened to all the queries very patiently and responded to our doubts. 5 star satisfaction from our end
Dr. Sudheer sir makes you feel so comfortable and the results after consultation has been more than satisfying.

** ******* ** ** ********* ******* listens to the problem with patience, and polite.  in emergency he is helpful , even at 1,2 am also he treated my son.  the best part is his medication is so simple, doesn't prescribe anti biotics quite often like now a day's doctors. am very thankful to dr Sudheer sir. he is the best.
He is very competent, calm and composed. Was really patient with all my queries. ********* ***** highly recommended!!
The service  that I receive from doctor is excellent. He did a great job .....his explained everything to me in a very clear manner. His was also kind and friendly.........
